item.description: The UCONN men's equestrian Polo Team plays a home game against Harvard on December 4th. If you've never seen this exciting, fast paced sport, it's a perfect opportunity :) The match starts at 2 pm, and will take place on the UCONN campus at the HORSEBARN HILL ARENA, on Horsebarn Hill Road. The atmosphere in the arena is usually very dusty, and dress is casual. The arena is unheated, so bundle up well-- it gets cold sitting in the bleachers :). Admission is free.

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Watch a Polo Match @ UCONN
